00032 #include <plugin.hpp>

00040 class disk : public cc_plugin {
00041  public:
00042     disk(std::string plugin_id,
00043          std::map<std::string,std::string> properties);
00044     virtual ~disk(void);
00045     virtual bool generate_and_publish_information(DDSDynamicDataWriter *writer,
00046                                                   DDS_DynamicData *data);
00047 
00048     virtual std::string plugin_class() 
00049       { 
00050             return "disk";
00051       }
00052     
00053  private:
00054     bool initialize_plugin(std::map<std::string, std::string> properties);  
00055     sigar_t *sig_;
00056     sigar_file_system_list_t fslist_;
00057     long timestamp_;
00058     char hostname_[SIGAR_MAXHOSTNAMELEN];
00059 };
00060 
00071 extern "C" cc_plugin* create_disk(std::string plugin_id,
00072                                   std::map<std::string,std::string> properties) {
00073     return new disk(plugin_id,properties);
00074 }
